label: departmentName
comment: A name, expressed as text, of the department to which this trade contact belongs within an organization.
The name, expressed as text, of a department for this trade address.
The name, expressed as text, of a department within this financial institution address.
The name, expressed as text, of the department to which this laboratory observation contact belongs.

domainIncludes.comment: The location at which a financial institution may be found or reached.
A person or department that acts as a point of contact for laboratory observations.
The location at which a particular trade related organization or person may be found or reached.
A person or a department that acts as a point of contact with another person or department in a trading relationship.
